Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral high-dose celecoxib twice daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral low-dose celecoxib twice daily . In arm , treatment continue first disease progression . At disease progression , treatment assignment unblinded treatment may continue treat physician 's discretion . Patients initially randomize low-dose arm may either continue dosage crossover high-dose arm . Patients initially randomize high-dose arm may continue dosage .
